text.more:
The keywords identified as trending in academic sources related to the Next Generation Internet have been used as a seed. The network contains all pages linked from at least two of these articles, and linking to at least two of these articles.

The size of each node is proportional to its degree, i.e. to its overall number of connections within this network.

Each colour indicates a cluster of articles densely connected with each other.
text.intro: Network of hyperlinks around Wikipedia articles corresponding to trending keywords related to NGI.
text.title: Keywords network expanded
